snippet: The Queens district attorney says the program has nothing to do with trying to get around the Miranda rule.
abstract: Letter from Queens County District Attorney Richard A Brown responds to May 3 editorial claiming that his office has undermined the basic principle of Miranda Rule by interrogating suspects before they are arraigned.
lead_paragraph: The Queens district attorney says the program has nothing to do with trying to get around the Miranda rule.

headline.main: The Queens D.A. Defends His Booking Program
headline.print_headline: The Queens D.A. Defends His Booking Program
